content: the same st double_crochet in the next double_crochet work 2dc in the next double_crochet 1dc in the next double_crochet 9x join 30 double_crochet round 4 ch3 work 1dc in the same st double_crochet in the next 2 double_crochet work 2dc in the next double_crochet double_crochet in the next 2 double_crochet 9x join 40 double_crochet rounds 5-18 continue pattern as set in round 4 adding one more double_crochet to the underlined section on each round until you have completed 14 rounds i e round 5 3dc round 6 4dc round 7 5dc etc 50-180 double_crochet cut yarn weave in all ends ten sided throw rug © 2003 vicki mikulak page 2
